channel.title: Lostcraft- Minecraft at its best- survive or go home
channel.description:
Lostcraft the best server ever come join now play for 18 hours and get regular we have 4 servers including a free build server and pvp server and a rp server and a smp server and a hungergames server here are some of the ips fb= fb.lostcraft.net smp= smp.lostcraft.net pvp= pvp.lostcraft.net rp= rp.lostcraft.net hg= hg.lostcraft.net
come join hope to see you there
the lostcraft team :cool:
